name: Old School
description:
'''Old School''' is the [[barbershop quartet]] that won the International Quartet Championship for 2011 at the [[Barbershop Harmony Society]]'s annual international convention, in [[Kansas City, Missouri|Kansas City]], [[Missouri]].
The quartet had earned silver medals the two years before, losing to [[Crossroads (quartet)|Crossroads]] and [[Storm Front (quartet)|Storm Front]] respectively, before winning gold medals in front of future champions [[Musical Island Boys]], [[Masterpiece (quartet)|Masterpiece]], Main Street, Forefront, and After Hours.
